config.script:
system.perspective.print(event)
	project = "HMS"
	selectedColumn = self.props.selection.selectedColumn
	if selectedColumn == 'note_id':
		rowToDelete = event.row
		statusIdToDelete = event.value.status_id
		noteIdToDelete = event.value.note_id
		statusNameToDelete = event.value.status_name
		if statusNameToDelete != 'Created' and (self.session.custom.isManager or self.session.custom.isAdministrator or self.session.custom.isWSSupportCoordinator or self.session.custom.isWSManager or self.session.custom.isSupportCoordinator):
			tableData = self.props.data
			lastRowInDataSet = tableData.getRowCount() - 1
			
			if rowToDelete != 0:
				if rowToDelete == lastRowInDataSet:
					## The entry being deleted is the latest entry
					## retrieve previous status id and update the referral status to that
					statusIdToUpdate = tableData.getValueAt(rowToDelete-1, 'status_id')
					## Update referral status to previous status
					#Update the referral status
					referral_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.referral_id
					time_created = tableData.getValueAt(rowToDelete-1, 'time_created')
					path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralDetailUpdate"
					parameters = {"row_id":referral_id,
							"status_id":statusIdToUpdate,
							"time_created":time_created}
					Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					
					
					
				## Delete the note
				deleteNoteQ = "DELETE FROM [participant].[ReferralLog] WHERE id = ?"
				system.db.runPrepUpdate(deleteNoteQ, [noteIdToDelete])
				
				if statusNameToDelete == 'Approved':
					## Delete the program from Participant
					participantId = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_id
					programId = self.view.custom.edit_data.program_id
					
					
					path = "Participants/Enrollments/ParticipantDeleteSelectedEnrollment"
					parameters = {"programId":programId,"participantId":participantId}
					system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)
				
					## This should also delete the Waiting list entry
					
			## refresh the notes table
			messageType = 'RefreshReferralsData'
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)

messageHandlers.script:
### Refresh data
	#system.perspective.print("Refresh Referral Detail")
	self.refreshBinding("props.data")
	self.props.selection.selectedRow = None

config.script:
#import time
	#Send the message to refresh the table
	messageType = 'RefreshReferralsData'
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload = {'row_num':-1})
	#wait for the table to refresh
	#self.view.params.row_data.referral_id = -1
	#time.sleep(.900)
	#if len(self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexRepeater").props.instances) == 0:
		# Add the first comment
		#system.perspective.print('Add Comment')
		#self.view.custom.func_add_comment = True
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.provider_id = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.program_id = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.provider_type_id = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.referral_id = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.reasonForEntryId = -1
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Participant").props.params.employee_id = self.session.custom.loggedInStaffEmployeeID
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Participant").props.params.referral_date = system.date.now()

import traceback
	try:
		project = "HMS"
		### Declare parameters 
		referral_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.referral_id
		if referral_id == -1:#Insert new data, no row_id
			type_id = 1
			time_created = self.view.custom.edit_data.referral_date
			status_id = 12
			user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
			participant_id = self.view.params.row_data.participant_id
			provider_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.provider_id
			program_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.program_id
			provider_type_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.provider_type_id
			employee_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
			ReasonForEntry_Id = self.view.custom.edit_data.reasonForEntryId
			participant_name = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery("SELECT firstName+' '+ IsNull(NullIf(middleName + ' ',''),'') + lastName FROM participant.vwParticipantDetails WHERE participantId = ?",[participant_id])
			system.perspective.print("participant_name: "+participant_name)
			
			## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
			valid = True
	
			if (referral_id is None):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Referral ID Error"
			elif (participant_id is None) or (int(participant_id) < 0):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Participant ID Error"
			elif (provider_type_id is None) or (int(provider_type_id) < 0):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please select a Provider Type"
			elif (provider_id is None) or (int(provider_id) < 0):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please select a Provider"
			elif (program_id is None) or (int(type_id) < 0):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please select a Program"
			elif (program_id is None) or (int(program_id) < 0):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please select a Program"
			elif (provider_type_id) == 7 and (int(ReasonForEntry_Id) < 0):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please select a Reason for Entry"
			elif time_created == None or time_created == "":
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please select a Referral Date"
			else:
				valid = True
				#system.perspective.print("Referral Data Valid")
			
			if valid:		
				### Check if the user is creating new data
			
				#system.perspective.print("Insert New Data")
				path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralDetailInsert"
				parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id,
							"provider_id":provider_id, 
							"status_id":status_id,
							"type_id":type_id,
							"program_id":program_id,
							"employee_id":employee_id,
							"ReasonForEntry_Id":ReasonForEntry_Id,
							"time_created":time_created}
				referral_row = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				#Insert the comments
				comment = "Full referral created by " + str(user_name)
				referral_id = referral_row
				path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralDetailNoteInsert"
				parameters = {"comment":comment,
							"referral_id":referral_id,
							"status_id":status_id,
							"type_id":type_id,
							"time_created":time_created,
							"user_name":user_name}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				
				
				## also add to Congregation Activity log if provider type is Congregation
				if provider_type_id == 8:
				
					## get the location Id 
					sqlQ = """
							SELECT [shelter].Location.id FROM
							   [organization].[Provider] , [shelter].Location
							  where [organization].[Provider].id = ?
							  AND [organization].[Provider].providerName = [shelter].Location.locationName
							  """
					locationData = system.db.runPrepQuery(sqlQ, [provider_id])
					if locationData is not None and locationData.getRowCount() > 0:
						insertLogQ = "INSERT INTO shelter.ActivityLog (locationId, activityType, activityDescription, referenceId, timeCreated ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)"
						system.db.runPrepUpdate(insertLogQ, [locationData.getValueAt(0,0),"referral_added",participant_name,referral_id])
				##### Refresh the table
				if Refresh:
					#system.perspective.print("Referral Query Success")
					self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Referral Created")	
				messageType = 'RefreshReferralsData'
				system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.provider_id = -1
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.program_id = -1
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.provider_type_id = -1
				self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.referral_id = -1
			else:
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage(error_message)
		else:#Exisitng referral, New Log Entry
			#system.perspective.print('Add Referral Log Entry')
			#Set the initial varibles
			self.view.custom.logEntry.dateEntry = system.date.now()
#			self.view.custom.logEntry.status_id = self.view.params.row_data.status_id
			self.view.custom.logEntry.status_id = -1
			self.view.params.newLogEntry = True
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants ReferralDetailEdit button_save")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

import traceback
	
	try:
		### Declare parameters
		project = "HMS" 
		referral_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.referral_id
					
		#Query and delete all comments linked to the referral
		path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralNotesSelect"
		parameters = {"referral_id":referral_id}
		comment_list = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
		#system.perspective.print(service_list.getRowCount())
		if comment_list.getRowCount():
			for comment in range(comment_list.getRowCount()):
				comment_id = comment_list.getValueAt(comment,'note_id')
				#Delete the comment
				path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralNotesDelete"
				parameters = {"row_id":comment_id}
				#system.perspective.print('Delete Service: ' + str(service))
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
		#Delete the Referral
		path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralDetailDelete"
		parameters = {"row_id":referral_id}
		#system.perspective.print('Delete Case Note: ' + str(note_id))
		Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		

		##### Refresh the table
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Referral Deleted")
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="RefreshReferralsData", payload={'row_num':-1}, scope="session")

	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants ReferralsDetailEdit button_delete")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while deleting data. Please try again.")

import traceback
	try:
		project = "HMS"
		### Declare parameters 
		comment = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row4").props.params.comment
		referral_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.referral_id
		time_created = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row4").props.params.time_created
		user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
		type_id = 1
		status_id = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row4").props.params.status_id
		participant_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_id
		program_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.program_id
		participant_name = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery("SELECT firstName+' '+ IsNull(NullIf(middleName + ' ',''),'') + lastName FROM participant.vwParticipantDetails WHERE participantId = ?",[participant_id])
		system.perspective.print("participant_name: "+participant_name)
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		valid = True
		if (referral_id is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Referral ID Error"
		elif (status_id is None) or (int(status_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Referral Status ID Error"
		else:
			valid = True
			#system.perspective.print("Referral Log Data Valid")
		if valid:		
			#Update the referral status
			path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralDetailUpdate"
			parameters = {"row_id":referral_id,
					"status_id":status_id,
					"latestReferralUpdate":time_created}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
			#Insert the log note
			path = "Participants/Referrals/ReferralDetailNoteInsert"
			parameters = {"comment":comment,
						"referral_id":referral_id,
						"status_id":status_id,
						"type_id":type_id,
						"time_created":time_created,
						"user_name":user_name}
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
			
			## if status is approved i.e. status_id = 5 then create program in partcipants
			# Commenting out below as per ticket #147
#			if int(status_id) == 5:
#				path = "Participants/Enrollments/ParticipantAddSelectedEnrollments"
#				parameters = {"programId":program_id,"participantId":participant_id}
##				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
#				system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)
			# End Change as per ticket #147
			##### Refresh the table
			if Refresh:
				#system.perspective.print("Referral Query Success")
				self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Referral Log Entry Created")	
			messageType = 'RefreshReferralsData'
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
			self.view.params.newLogEntry = False
			## also add to Congregation Activity log if provider type is Congregation
			provider_type_id = self.view.params.row_data.provider_type_id
			provider_id = self.view.params.row_data.provider_id
			if provider_type_id == 8:
				## get the location Id 
				sqlQ = """
						SELECT [shelter].Location.id FROM
						   [organization].[Provider] , [shelter].Location
						  where [organization].[Provider].id = ?
						  AND [organization].[Provider].providerName = [shelter].Location.locationName
						  """
				locationData = system.db.runPrepQuery(sqlQ, [provider_id])
				if locationData is not None and locationData.getRowCount() > 0:
					insertLogQ = "INSERT INTO shelter.ActivityLog (locationId, activityType, activityDescription, referenceId, timeCreated ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)"
					system.db.runPrepUpdate(insertLogQ, [locationData.getValueAt(0,0),"referral_changed",participant_name,referral_id])
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage(error_message)
		
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants ReferralDetailEdit button_save_log_entry")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

import traceback
	try:

		self.view.params.newLogEntry = False


	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants ReinstatementDetailEdit New Log Cancel Button")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

props.text: Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(3)
	self.meta.visible = False
